description: Divinae Institutiones; De Ira Dei; De Opificio; De Ave Phoenice; Ser Ricciardo di Nanni (Italian, active 1449 - 1480), Lucius Caecilius Firmianus Lactantius (Roman, about 240 - about 320), Leonardo di Giovanni Tolosani da Colle (Italian (Florentine), 1430 - 1497); Florence, Tuscany, Italy; 1456; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with red morocco; Leaf: 32.9 × 22.1 cm (12 15/16 × 8 11/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XI 1; J.
